00017 #include "MisrFileQuery.h"
00018 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00019 #include "MisrError.h"
00020 #include <hdf.h>
00021 #include <HdfEosDef.h>
00022 #include <string.h>
00023 
00040 MTKt_status MtkFileGridToFieldList(
00041   const char *filename, 
00042   const char *gridname, 
00043   int *nfields, 
00044   char **fieldlist[]  )
00045 {
00046   MTKt_status status;       /* Return status of called functions */
00047   MTKt_status status_code;  /* Return status of this function. */
00048   intn hdfstatus;       /* HDF-EOS return status */
00049   int32 Fid = FAIL;             /* HDF-EOS File ID */
00050 
00051   if (filename == NULL)
00052     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);  
00053 
00054   /* Open HDF file for reading */
00055   hdfstatus = Fid = GDopen((char*)filename,DFACC_READ);
00056   if (hdfstatus == FAIL)
00057     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDOPEN_FAILED);
00058 
00059   /* Read list of fields. */
00060   status = MtkFileGridToFieldListFid(Fid, gridname, nfields, fieldlist);
00061   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00062 
00063   /* Close file. */
00064   hdfstatus = GDclose(Fid);
00065   if (hdfstatus == FAIL)
00066     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDCLOSE_FAILED);
00067   Fid = FAIL;
00068 
00069   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00070 
00071  ERROR_HANDLE:
00072   if (Fid != FAIL) GDclose(Fid);
00073 
00074   return status_code;
00075 }
00076 
00082 MTKt_status MtkFileGridToFieldListFid(
00083   int32 Fid,            
00084   const char *gridname, 
00085   int *nfields, 
00086   char **fieldlist[]  )
00087 {
00088   MTKt_status status;       /* Return status of called functions */
00089   MTKt_status status_code;  /* Return status of this function. */
00090   intn hdfstatus;       /* HDF-EOS return status */
00091   int32 Gid = FAIL;             /* HDF-EOS Grid ID */
00092   int32 num_fields = 0;         /* Number of fields */
00093   char *list = NULL;            /* List of fields */
00094   int i;
00095   char *temp = NULL;
00096   MTKt_FileType filetype;
00097   int32 str_buffer_size = 0;
00098 
00099   /* Check Arguments */
00100   if (fieldlist == NULL)
00101     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00102 
00103   *fieldlist = NULL; /* Set output to NULL to prevent freeing unallocated
00104                         memory in case of error. */
00105 
00106   if (gridname == NULL)
00107     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00108 
00109   if (nfields == NULL)
00110     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00111 
00112   /* Attach to grid */
00113   hdfstatus = Gid = GDattach(Fid,(char*)gridname);
00114   if (hdfstatus == FAIL)
00115     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDATTACH_FAILED);
00116 
00117   /* Query length of fields string */
00118   hdfstatus = GDnentries(Gid, HDFE_NENTDFLD, &str_buffer_size);
00119   if(hdfstatus == FAIL)
00120     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDNENTRIES_FAILED);
00121 
00122   list = (char*)malloc((str_buffer_size + 1) * sizeof(char));
00123   if (list == NULL)
00124     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_MALLOC_FAILED);
00125 
00126   /* Get list of fields */
00127   hdfstatus = num_fields = GDinqfields(Gid,list,NULL,NULL);
00128   if (hdfstatus == FAIL)
00129     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDINQFIELDS_FAILED);
00130 
00131   *nfields = num_fields;
00132   *fieldlist = (char**)calloc(num_fields,sizeof(char*));
00133   if (*fieldlist == NULL)
00134     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_CALLOC_FAILED);
00135     
00136   temp = strtok(list,",");
00137   i = 0;
00138   while (temp != NULL)
00139   {
00140     (*fieldlist)[i] = (char*)malloc((strlen(temp) + 1) * sizeof(char));
00141     if ((*fieldlist)[i] == NULL)
00142       MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_MALLOC_FAILED);
00143     strcpy((*fieldlist)[i],temp);
00144     temp = strtok(NULL,",");
00145     ++i;
00146   }
00147 
00148   free(list);
00149 
00150   hdfstatus = GDdetach(Gid);
00151   if (hdfstatus == FAIL)
00152     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDDETACH_FAILED);
00153 
00154   /* Add all possible unpacked and unscaled fields to raw field list */
00155   status = MtkFileTypeFid(Fid, &filetype);
00156   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00157 
00158   switch (filetype) {
00159 
00160   case MTK_GRP_ELLIPSOID_GM:
00161   case MTK_GRP_TERRAIN_GM:
00162   case MTK_GRP_ELLIPSOID_LM:
00163   case MTK_GRP_TERRAIN_LM:
00164     if (strstr(gridname, "Band") != NULL)
00165     {
00166       char **fieldlist_tmp;
00167       char band[15];
00168       char *nf[] = { "Radiance", "RDQI", "DN", "Equivalent Reflectance", "Brf" };
00169       int nf_size = sizeof(nf)/sizeof(*nf);
00170       char *sp;
00171       int k, len;
00172 
00173       *nfields += nf_size;
00174       fieldlist_tmp = (char**)calloc(*nfields,sizeof(char*));
00175       if (fieldlist_tmp == NULL)
00176     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_CALLOC_FAILED);
00177 
00178       /* Copy the native fields */
00179       for (i = 0; i < num_fields; ++i) {
00180     fieldlist_tmp[i] = (*fieldlist)[i];
00181       }
00182 
00183       /* Isolate the Band */
00184       strncpy(band, gridname, sizeof(band));
00185       if ((sp = strstr(band, "Band")) == NULL)
00186     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00187       *sp = '\0';
00188 
00189       /* Fill in unpacked/unscaled fields */
00190       for(i = 0; i < nf_size; i++) {
00191     k = i + num_fields;
00192     len = (int)(strlen(band) + strlen(nf[i]) + 2);
00193     fieldlist_tmp[k] = (char *)malloc(len *sizeof(char));
00194     if(fieldlist_tmp[k] == NULL)
00195       MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_MALLOC_FAILED);
00196     strcpy(fieldlist_tmp[k], band);
00197     strcat(fieldlist_tmp[k], " ");
00198     strcat(fieldlist_tmp[k], nf[i]);
00199       }
00200 
00201       free(*fieldlist);
00202       *fieldlist = fieldlist_tmp;
00203     }
00204     break;
00205   case MTK_AS_LAND:
00206     {
00207       char **fieldlist_tmp;
00208       int j = 0;        /* field count */
00209       MTKt_DataBuffer sf = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00210       char attrname[MAXSTR];
00211       int len;
00212 
00213       fieldlist_tmp = (char**)calloc(num_fields * 2,sizeof(char*));
00214       if (fieldlist_tmp == NULL)
00215     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_CALLOC_FAILED);
00216 
00217       for (i = 0; i < num_fields; ++i) {
00218     fieldlist_tmp[j++] = (*fieldlist)[i];
00219     strncpy(attrname, "Scale ", MAXSTR);
00220     strncat(attrname, (*fieldlist)[i], MAXSTR);
00221     status = MtkGridAttrGetFid(Fid, gridname, attrname, &sf);
00222     if (status == MTK_SUCCESS) {
00223       len = (int)(strlen("Raw ") + strlen((*fieldlist)[i]) + 1);
00224       fieldlist_tmp[j] = (char *)malloc(len * sizeof(char));
00225       if (fieldlist_tmp[j] == NULL)
00226         MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_MALLOC_FAILED);
00227       strncpy(fieldlist_tmp[j], "Raw ", len);
00228           strncat(fieldlist_tmp[j++], (*fieldlist)[i], len);
00229       MtkDataBufferFree(&sf);
00230     }
00231     if (((strncmp((*fieldlist)[i], "LandHDRF", MAXSTR) == 0) &&
00232          (strncmp((*fieldlist)[i], "LandHDRFUnc", MAXSTR) != 0)) ||
00233         (strncmp((*fieldlist)[i], "LandBRF", MAXSTR)  == 0) ||
00234         (strncmp((*fieldlist)[i], "LAIDelta1", MAXSTR) ==0) ||
00235         (strncmp((*fieldlist)[i], "LAIDelta2", MAXSTR) ==0)) {
00236       len = (int)(strlen("Flag ") + strlen((*fieldlist)[i]) + 1);
00237       fieldlist_tmp[j] = (char *)malloc(len * sizeof(char));
00238       if (fieldlist_tmp[j] == NULL)
00239         MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_MALLOC_FAILED);
00240       strncpy(fieldlist_tmp[j], "Flag ", len);
00241           strncat(fieldlist_tmp[j++], (*fieldlist)[i], len);
00242     }
00243       }
00244       *nfields = j;
00245 
00246       free(*fieldlist);
00247       *fieldlist = (char **)realloc((void *)fieldlist_tmp, 
00248                     *nfields * sizeof(char *));
00249       if (*fieldlist == NULL)
00250     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_REALLOC_FAILED);
00251     }
00252     break;    
00253   case MTK_TC_CLOUD:
00254   {
00255     char **fieldlist_tmp;
00256     int j = 0;      /* field count */
00257     int len;
00258         
00259 
00260     fieldlist_tmp = (char**)calloc(num_fields * 2,sizeof(char*));
00261     if (fieldlist_tmp == NULL)
00262       MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_CALLOC_FAILED);
00263 
00264     for (i = 0; i < num_fields; ++i) {
00265       MTKt_DataBuffer scale = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00266       fieldlist_tmp[j++] = (*fieldlist)[i];
00267       MtkFieldAttrGetFid(Fid, (*fieldlist)[i], "scale_factor", &scale);
00268       if (scale.nline) {         
00269           len = (int)(strlen("Raw ") + strlen((*fieldlist)[i]) + 1);
00270           fieldlist_tmp[j] = (char *)malloc(len * sizeof(char));
00271           if (fieldlist_tmp[j] == NULL)
00272             MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_MALLOC_FAILED);
00273           strncpy(fieldlist_tmp[j], "Raw ", len);
00274               strncat(fieldlist_tmp[j++], (*fieldlist)[i], len);
00275       }
00276       MtkDataBufferFree(&scale);
00277     }
00278     *nfields = j;
00279     free(*fieldlist);
00280     *fieldlist = (char **)realloc((void *)fieldlist_tmp, 
00281                 *nfields * sizeof(char *));
00282     if (*fieldlist == NULL)
00283       MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_REALLOC_FAILED);
00284     break;
00285   }  
00286   default:
00287     break;
00288   }
00289 
00290   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00291 
00292  ERROR_HANDLE:
00293   if (fieldlist != NULL)
00294     MtkStringListFree(num_fields, fieldlist);
00295 
00296   if (nfields != NULL)
00297     *nfields = -1;
00298 
00299   free(list);
00300   GDdetach(Gid);
00301 
00302   return status_code;
00303 }
